channel.title: Processes - David Vargas
channel.description: Ps (Processes) Processes are the programs that are running on your machine. The are managed by the kernel. PID ID associated with each process. Assigned in the order that the processes are created. $ ps - shows a list of running processes. PID: Process ID TTY: Controlling terminal associated with the process STAT: Process status code TIME: Total CPU usage time CMD: Name of executable/ command $ ps aux a - displays all processes running - even by other users
